title: Kaddish
summary: Kaddish or Qaddish or Qadish (Aramaic: קדיש‎ "holy") is a hymn praising God that is recited during Jewish prayer services. The central theme of the Kaddish is the magnification and sanctification of God's name. In the liturgy, different versions of the Kaddish are functionally chanted or sung as separators of the different sections of the service.
